input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 11 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 6 days in Zurich. You want to spend 2 days in Brussels. You want to spend 3 days in Manchester. You are going to attend a wedding in Manchester between day 9 and day 11. You want to spend 3 days in Seville. During day 7 and day 9, you have to attend a conference in Seville.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Brussels and Seville, Zurich and Manchester, Brussels and Manchester, Seville and Manchester, Zurich and Brussels.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 11 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
